      • isPrimitive

        public static boolean isPrimitive(java.lang.Class<?> targetType)
        Returns true if the target type represents a primitive constant according to the operator framework. Primitives are represented as OperatorConstantNode. The set of primitives corresponds to Java primitives and their Object representations, as well as enumerations and Strings.
        Parameters:
        targetType -
        Returns:
